django.templatetags.l10n

Attributes

register

Classes

LocalizeNode

Functions

localize(value)

Force a value to be rendered as a localized value,

unlocalize(value)

Force a value to be rendered as a non-localized value,

localize_tag(parser, token)

Force or prevents localization of values, regardless of the value of

Module Contents

django.templatetags.l10n.register[source]
django.templatetags.l10n.localize(value)[source]

Force a value to be rendered as a localized value, regardless of the value of settings.USE_L10N.

django.templatetags.l10n.unlocalize(value)[source]

Force a value to be rendered as a non-localized value, regardless of the value of settings.USE_L10N.

class django.templatetags.l10n.LocalizeNode(nodelist, use_l10n)[source]

Bases: django.template.Node

nodelist[source]
use_l10n[source]
render(context)[source]
django.templatetags.l10n.localize_tag(parser, token)[source]

Force or prevents localization of values, regardless of the value of settings.USE_L10N.

Sample usage:

{% localize off %}
    var pi = {{ 3.1415 }};
{% endlocalize %}
